name: Neon Explosion
description:
Shoot enemies and dash in front of them, but be careful your weapon could (and will) explode.

P.S. If you get stuck killing an enemy with the lightsaber, press escape, that will fix it lmao

P.S. Well, this is my first game ever, so its kinda doo - doo, but i had a lot of fun making it and hopefully in the future i'll make more c:, Any and all critics or recommendation are welcome! i really want to learn more about making games.
